title: Challenge 9: SSD1306 Graphics Display
description: Display text on an SSD1306 graphics display.
codeSolution:
import machine
import ssd1306

i2c = machine.I2C(sda=machine.Pin(4), scl=machine.Pin(5))
display = ssd1306.SSD1306_I2C(128, 64, i2c)

display.fill(0)
display.text('Hello,', 0, 0)
display.text('MicroPython!', 0, 16)
display.show()
